text: Anthony Edward Lowry "Tony" Britton (9 June 1924 - 22 December 2019) was an English actor. He was known for his role as Inspector Thomas in the 1973 movie The Day of the Jackal. Britton died on 22 December 2019 at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Performances listed in Theatre Archive University of Bristol Category:1924 births Category:2019 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Birmingham
title: Tony Britton
